welcome_message_body: Welcome to Samborondon, a charming city known for its beautiful waterfront and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport handles all domestic flights within Ecuador.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Jose Joaquin De Olmedo Airport serves all international flights to and from Ecuador.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
